entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 a.m. PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 12:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
